content:
Should we include one button(with existing Show/change your API key button) in dev environment for getting/generating API key ?
Which directly generate/show API key without asking password.
Screenshot-from-2017-12-13-18-01-02.png

I think it would be reasonable for this screen to just print it in the dev environment
pasted image, maybe below the Get API key button

Right, so like two buttons Get API key and second only in dev environment Skip(only available in dev env)?
I am not sure, like if it is used in dev environment frequently then we should add this.
I mean to just paste it in blue, without having to click another button, if that makes sense? (Though not if that would lead to messier code, in which case having a link seems reasonable)
